title: Shotgun to Release MTB Activity Pack for Little Shredders
content:
This September, Shotgun, maker of the Kids MTB Tow Rope and front-mounted Shotgun Kids MTB Seat, will release a mountain bike-oriented activity book package for tiny shredders. Shred Til Bed MTB Activity Pack Specs The Shred Til Bed MTB Activity Pack is targeted at kiddos ages 3 and up. With it, Shotgun aims to stoke [â€¦]

The post Shotgun to Release MTB Activity Pack for Little Shredders appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
